info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 6:59PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTH CENTRAL SALT LAKE AND NORTH CENTRAL UTAH COUNTIES... At 658 PM MST...A snow squall was over Sandy...moving southeast at 15 mph. Snowfall rates of around 1/2 inch per hour have been observed. Locations impacted include... Sandy, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, American Fork, Lindon, Alpine, Bluffdale, Little Cottonwood Creek Valley, Granite, Little Cottonwood Canyon, Camp Williams, Big Cottonwood Canyon, Highland and Cedar Hills. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 275 and 297. * winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
